title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\VoiceSelectionParams
name: VoiceSelectionParams
description:
Description of which voice to use for speech synthesis.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.VoiceSelectionParams

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Optional. The name of the voice. If not set, the service will choose a voice based on the other parameters such as language_code and [ssml_gender][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.VoiceSelectionParams.ssml_gender].

params.name: data.ssml_gender
params.description: Optional. The preferred gender of the voice. If not set, the service will choose a voice based on the other parameters such as language_code and [name][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.VoiceSelectionParams.name]. Note that this is only a preference, not requirement. If a voice of the appropriate gender is not available, the synthesizer should substitute a voice with a different gender rather than failing the request.

methods.name: getName
methods.description:
Optional. The name of the voice. If not set, the service will choose a voice based on the other parameters such as language_code and [ssml_gender][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.VoiceSelectionParams.ssml_gender].
